tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_programs(
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    program_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE training_programs (
   program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   duration_hours INT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_programs (
   employee_id INT,
   program_id INT,
   completion_status BOOLEAN,
   participation_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES training_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE training_programs (
   program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   duration_hours INT
);

CREATE TABLE training_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  program_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_participation (
  participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  program_id INT,
  participation_date DATE,
  completion_status BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES training_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE completion_certificates (
  certificate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  program_id INT,
  completion_date DATE,
  certificate_path VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES training_programs(program_id)
);
